name: Pit of Babel
description:
A small and brutal gamejam, made during the night. 

Spiral to me, spiral together.

Construct a tower in search of heaven amidst an unforgiving and anatomical world. Grind gentler life to produce blocks of stone to build with. Discover the story of two souls searching for the dregs of a miracle. Babel is destined to collapse.

Pit of Babel was developed by Scottie Supple and Maceo bob Mair.  Sound Design by Pato Flores and Composed by Daniel Shypilov.

Pit of Babel is a free gamejam available for Windows computers.
